com.burstly.lib.exception
Class UnhandledExceptionDumpWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.exception.UnhandledExceptionDumpWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
public final class UnhandledExceptionDumpWrapper
extends Object
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler handler that dumps current IAdaptorController state. It is used in UI thread before any kind of unchecked exception. It provides current active component state to make easier to find cause of exceptions if it is related to Burstly code.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
